ID 号为 4952 和 4954 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4952  
      主题: Shipping question  
      描述:  Hello. I want to buy a pedal baseplate. Can I send it to an address in mainland China and will it arrive without any additional processing or charges?  Just to put this in context, an acquaintance would receive it at that location in China and then bring it to me in his luggage when he returns from his trip.  Regards.
